Summary: The document outlines the key responsibilities and requirements for the role of Data Scientist at Zhentu Technology. The main responsibilities include analyzing and interpreting large data sets, developing data models, and providing customized data analytics solutions. Essential requirements for the role include a Master's degree in a relevant field, at least 5 years of experience in data science, and proficiency in statistical analysis and programming languages. Experience with data analysis and machine learning libraries and data visualization tools is also required. Additional desirable qualifications include experience in an agile development environment, working with large datasets, and working in cross-functional teams.

The Data Analyst position at Zhentu Technology requires a bachelor's degree in statistics, mathematics, computer science, or related fields, as well as at least 2 years of work experience in data analysis. The key responsibilities include collecting and processing large amounts of data, using statistical methods and data analysis techniques, building data models and algorithms, and preparing and presenting data analysis reports. The ideal candidate should also have strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills, proficiency in data analysis tools and software, and experience with data visualization tools. Additional qualifications that would be a plus include experience in an agile development environment, knowledge of machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies, and project management skills.
